dublin_core.dcvalue: By exploiting its ability to play sounds a mobile phone with suitable software installed can serve the basic functions of a potentiostat in controlling an applied potential to oxidise ECL active molecules while the resultant photonic signal is monitored using the camera in video mode In combination with paper microfluidic sensors this opens significant new possibilities for low cost instrument free sensing
Use of a mobile phone for potentiostatic control with low cost paper-based microfluidic sensors.
